## alpha variable

Matcher for single A-Z or a-z characters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alpha: <C, R>(success?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined, fail?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined) => Matcher<string, C, R>
```
